field.name: body
field.eval: '@Michael Demo ' 'We\'ve scheduled the 100m² tent for the event on June 8th, but there\'s a tear in the canvas that needs repair before then.' ' Please make sure it\'s fixed and ready no later than June 5th so we have time to check everything before delivery. Let me know once the repair is done.'

record.field: ⭐⭐⭐"An exquisite venue that adds a touch of class to any event." - Feedback Axivax
